6996 m_part_items *= static_cast<float>( vp.part().info().cargo_weight_modifier ) / 100.0f;
6997 }
6998 m_part += m_part_items;
6999
7000 if( vp.has_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE ) && vp.part().has_flag( vehicle_part::passenger_flag ) ) {
7001 const player *p = get_passenger( i );
7002 // Sometimes flag is wrongly set, don't crash!
7003 m_part += p != nullptr ? p->get_weight() : 0_gram;
7004 }
7005
7006 if( use_precalc ) {
7007 xf += vp.part().precalc[0].x * m_part;
7008 yf += vp.part().precalc[0].y * m_part;
7009 } else {
7010 xf += vp.mount().x * m_part;
7011 yf += vp.mount().y * m_part;
7012 }
7013
7014 m_total += m_part;
7015 }
7016
7017 mass_cache = m_total;
7018 mass_dirty = false;
7019
7020 const float x = xf / mass_cache;
7021 const float y = yf / mass_cache;
7022 if( use_precalc ) {
7023 mass_center_precalc.x = std::round( x );
7024 mass_center_precalc.y = std::round( y );
7025 mass_center_precalc_dirty = false;
7026 } else {
7027 mass_center_no_precalc.x = std::round( x );
7028 mass_center_no_precalc.y = std::round( y );
7029 mass_center_no_precalc_dirty = false;
7030 }
7031}
7032
7033bounding_box vehicle::get_bounding_box( )
7034{
7035 int min_x = INT_MAX;
7036 int max_x = INT_MIN;
7037 int min_y = INT_MAX;
7038 int max_y = INT_MIN;
7039
7040 set_facing( turn_dir );
7041
7042 int i_use = 0;
7043 for( const tripoint &p : get_points( true ) ) {
7044 const point pt = parts[part_at( p.xy() )].precalc[i_use].xy();
7045 if( pt.x < min_x ) {
7046 min_x = pt.x;
7047 }
7048 if( pt.x > max_x ) {
7049 max_x = pt.x;
7050 }
7051 if( pt.y < min_y ) {
7052 min_y = pt.y;
7053 }
7054 if( pt.y > max_y ) {
7055 max_y = pt.y;
7056 }
7057 }
7058 bounding_box b;
7059 b.p1 = point( min_x, min_y );
7060 b.p2 = point( max_x, max_y );
7061 return b;
7062}
7063
7064vehicle_part_range vehicle::get_all_parts() const
7065{
7066 return vehicle_part_range( const_cast<vehicle &>( *this ) );
7067}
7068
7069int vehicle::part_count() const
7070{
7071 return static_cast<int>( parts.size() );
7072}
7073
7074vehicle_part &vehicle::part( int part_num )
7075{
7076 return parts[part_num];
7077}
7078
7079const vehicle_part &vehicle::cpart( int part_num ) const
7080{
7081 return const_cast<vehicle_part &>( parts[part_num] );
7082}
7083
7084bool vehicle::valid_part( int part_num ) const
7085{
7086 return part_num >= 0 && part_num < static_cast<int>( parts.size() );
7087}
7088
7089std::set<int> vehicle::advance_precalc_mounts( const point &new_pos, const tripoint &src )
7090{
7091 map &here = get_map();
7092 std::set<int> smzs;
7093
7094 for( vehicle_part &prt : parts ) {
7095 here.clear_vehicle_point_from_cache( this, src + prt.precalc[0] );
7096 prt.precalc[0] = prt.precalc[1];
7097
7098 smzs.insert( prt.precalc[0].z );
7099 }
7100
7101 pivot_anchor[0] = pivot_anchor[1];
7102 pivot_rotation[0] = pivot_rotation[1];
7103 pos = new_pos;
7104
7105 // Invalidate vehicle's point cache
7106 occupied_cache_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
7107 return smzs;
7108}
7109
7110bool vehicle::refresh_zones()
7111{
7112 if( zones_dirty ) {
7113 decltype( loot_zones ) new_zones;
7114 for( auto const &z : loot_zones ) {
7115 zone_data zone = z.second;
7116 //Get the global position of the first cargo part at the relative coordinate
7117
7118 const int part_idx = part_with_feature( z.first, "CARGO", false );
7119 if( part_idx == -1 ) {
7120 debugmsg( "Could not find cargo part at %d,%d on vehicle %s for loot zone. Removing loot zone.",
7121 z.first.x, z.first.y, this->name );
7122
7123 // If this loot zone refers to a part that no longer exists at this location, then its unattached somehow.
7124 // By continuing here and not adding to new_zones, we effectively remove it
7125 continue;
7126 }
7127 tripoint zone_pos = global_part_pos3( part_idx );
7128 zone_pos = g->m.getabs( zone_pos );
7129 //Set the position of the zone to that part
7130 zone.set_position( std::pair<tripoint, tripoint>( zone_pos, zone_pos ), false );
7131 new_zones.emplace( z.first, zone );
7132 }
7133 loot_zones = new_zones;
7134 zones_dirty = false;
7135 return true;
7136 }
7137 return false;
7138}
7139
7140template<>
7141bool vehicle_part_with_feature_range<std::string>::matches( const size_t part ) const
7142{
7143 const vehicle_part &vp = this->vehicle().part( part );
7144 return vp.info().has_flag( feature_ ) &&
7145 !vp.removed &&
7146 ( !( part_status_flag::working & required_ ) || !vp.is_broken() ) &&
7147 ( !( part_status_flag::available & required_ ) || vp.is_available() ) &&
7148 ( !( part_status_flag::enabled & required_ ) || vp.enabled );
7149}
7150
7151template<>
7152bool vehicle_part_with_feature_range<vpart_bitflags>::matches( const size_t part ) const
7153{
7154 const vehicle_part &vp = this->vehicle().part( part );
7155 return vp.info().has_flag( feature_ ) &&
7156 !vp.removed &&
7157 ( !( part_status_flag::working & required_ ) || !vp.is_broken() ) &&
7158 ( !( part_status_flag::available & required_ ) || vp.is_available() ) &&
7159 ( !( part_status_flag::enabled & required_ ) || vp.enabled );
7160}
